message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to make a smart investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,300,000.

I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to invest a little less. I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for the product. It's still a good deal for both of us, and I'm confident this will be a mutually beneficial transaction.

I understand you're looking to invest a bit less, but I'm still confident this product has tremendous value. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $1,280,000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
